revised_title: Navigating the North-East Route to the East-Indies and Discovering Tartary
tldr: The author recounts various voyages undertaken to find a way to sail around the North to the East-Indies and return. The text discusses the Dutch East-India Company's instructions for discovering the land of Jesso near Japan and sailing through Northern America to the East-Indies. The author also provides details on the geography, climate, and potential trade opportunities in Tartary, emphasizing the importance of understanding local customs and establishing friendly relations for successful exploration and trade.
